<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Webhook Connectivity Check</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/cloud/2.0/agg/notifications/profiles/webhook/test"}></MethodEndpoint>



### Overview

Test webhook connectivity from the multi-tenant notification service
to the provided notification webhook URL

## Request
